    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • act

      private void act()
      Acting method for all actors Waits until the wakeUp() method notifies the thread, then the work() method is called

    • work

      protected abstract boolean work()
      Working method of the actor
      Returns:
      true if the actor has more work to do, and false if the actor has no more work to do for the moment, so the thread can fall into the wait() mode

    • wakeUp

      public void wakeUp()
      Wakes up the actor thread. This is the method where the notify() call must be placed
